text:
Aahoo Jahansouz "Sarah" Shahi (; born January 10, 1980) is an American television actress and former NFL Cheerleader. She played Kate Reed in the USA Network legal drama "Fairly Legal" in 2011–12, Carmen on "The L Word" in 2008, and also starred as Sameen Shaw on the CBS crime drama "Person of Interest".
Shahi has also appeared as the main female role Det. Dani Reese in "Life", and in a supporting role in "Alias".
